system.description:
You combine leadership, skill at arms, and access to divine power into a single, unified whole. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain proficiency with the Sanctified Steel or Tempered Iron combat tradition and learn a maneuver of a degree you could learn from your chosen tradition. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • Your prestige level is treated as 2 higher than normal with members of your own faith or religious organization or the supernatural servants of your divine patron. With the clergy, faithful, or supernatural servants of other faiths or religious organizations, it is treated as 1 higher instead.
  • When you cast a spell of the compulsion school, targets inside the range of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d71mc2057x7y6c08]{Commanding Presence} treat the save DC (if any) as 1 higher than normal.
  • Half your cleric levels are treated as marshal levels for the purpose of the marshal’s @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.glbhnd16q6qmysjh]{Extra Attack} feature.
